name: CEEweb for Biodiversity
goal:
The mission of CEEweb for Biodiversity is the conservation of biodiversity in Central and Eastern Europe through the promotion of sustainable development.

CEEweb works through advocacy, influencing decision making, common projects, capacity building, networking and awareness raising.

It targets its members, local, national and international decision makers, NGOs and NGO networks, companies and the scientific community.

One primary aim of the organization is to help the implementation of international tasks under the Convention on Biological Diversity. Presently CEEweb is the only network in operation which has been set up and run by nature conservation NGOs in Central and Eastern Europe.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Natura 2000
EU Biodiversity Strategy (in relation to: MAES, Green Infrastructure, Restoration Prioritization Frameworks, Climate Change Strategies and biodiversity proofed national programming of Structural and Cohesion Funds)
Environment Action Programme
Water Framework Directive
CAP
Sustainable Development Goals
EU budget, MFF
Stronger implementation of international policies (SDGs, CBD, CITES)
Resource use
